#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t;
	  string s;
	cin>>t;
	for(int k=0;k<t;k++){
		cin>>s;
		int b=s.length();
		sort(s.begin(),s.end());
		int i=0;
		s[b]='#';
		int count=0;
		while(i<b-1){
			if(s[i]==s[i+1]){
				count++;
				i+=2;	
			}
			else
			i++;	
		}
		cout<<b-count<<endl;
		
		
		
	}
	
	
	
	return 0;
}
